description.last_approved_text: "Reading of the toils of others, make you appreciate life all the more."

description.last_approved_text: "Villains to a man, but they do it with such impeccable panache."

ceo_equipped_set_bonuses.title: Bandits & Rogues

description.last_approved_text: "Not much of a brain between them, but they most certainly can fight!"

ceo_equipped_set_bonuses.description: "Not much of a brain between them, but they most certainly can fight!"
ceo_equipped_set_bonuses.title: Bruisers & Brawlers

description.last_approved_text: What they lack in familial warmth, they make up for with martial synergy.

ceo_equipped_set_bonuses.description: What they lack in familial warmth, they make up for with martial synergy.
ceo_equipped_set_bonuses.title: Cousins-in-Arms

description.last_approved_text: Fathers influence all children with their presence, their lack thereof, and everything inbetween.

ceo_equipped_set_bonuses.description: Fathers influence all children with their presence, their lack thereof, and everything inbetween.
ceo_equipped_set_bonuses.title: Father Figures

description.last_approved_text: "When one elite simply won't do."

ceo_equipped_set_bonuses.description: "When one elite simply won't do."
ceo_equipped_set_bonuses.title: Five Elites

description.last_approved_text: "The art of war is as the art of life. Proceed to fast or too slow, and you will come to ruin."

ceo_equipped_set_bonuses.description: "The art of war is as the art of life. Proceed to fast or too slow, and you will come to ruin."
ceo_equipped_set_bonuses.title: Great Strategists

description.last_approved_text: Determined bulwarks of the northern territories. Under no circumstances to be mistaken for the Warriors of the South.

ceo_equipped_set_bonuses.description: Determined bulwarks of the northern territories. Under no circumstances to be mistaken for the Warriors of the South.
ceo_equipped_set_bonuses.title: Northern Defenders

description.last_approved_text: "Aha. That is not correct, because according to the encyclopaedia of…"

ceo_equipped_set_bonuses.description: "Aha. That is not correct, because according to the encyclopaedia of…"
ceo_equipped_set_bonuses.title: Scholars

description.last_approved_text: Sometimes, the sons are indeed damned by the sins of the father…

ceo_equipped_set_bonuses.description: Sometimes, the sons are indeed damned by the sins of the father…
ceo_equipped_set_bonuses.title: Setting Suns

description.last_approved_text: What these warriors share, let no blade nor storm rend asunder.

ceo_equipped_set_bonuses.description: What these warriors share, let no blade nor storm rend asunder.
ceo_equipped_set_bonuses.title: Sworn Brothers

description.last_approved_text: Great lords and masters of the land, brough to heel by one far more talented and capable.

ceo_equipped_set_bonuses.description: Great lords and masters of the land, brough to heel by one far more talented and capable.
ceo_equipped_set_bonuses.title: Three Kingdoms

description.last_approved_text: Five renowned warriors, their prowess supposedly unmatched. Until now.

ceo_equipped_set_bonuses.description: Five renowned warriors, their prowess supposedly unmatched. Until now.
ceo_equipped_set_bonuses.title: Tiger Generals

description.last_approved_text: Those who would cast out their saviour and heir-presumptive soon enough find themselves at his mercy.

ceo_equipped_set_bonuses.description: Those who would cast out their saviour and heir-presumptive soon enough find themselves at his mercy.
ceo_equipped_set_bonuses.title: Traitors of Chang'an

description.last_approved_text: Stalwart and proud warriors of the southlands. Absolutely never to be confused with the Northern Defenders.

ceo_equipped_set_bonuses.description: Stalwart and proud warriors of the southlands. Absolutely never to be confused with the Northern Defenders.
ceo_equipped_set_bonuses.title: Warriors of the South

description.last_approved_text: A noble ideal, perhaps, soured into violent revolution, and silenced by the blade of the worthy.

ceo_equipped_set_bonuses.description: A noble ideal, perhaps, soured into violent revolution, and silenced by the blade of the worthy.
ceo_equipped_set_bonuses.title: Yellow Turbans

description.last_approved_text: A great lineage, brought low by arrogance, disinclination, and the strength of a peerless warrior.

ceo_equipped_set_bonuses.description: A great lineage, brought low by arrogance, disinclination, and the strength of a peerless warrior.
ceo_equipped_set_bonuses.title: Yuan Clan

description.last_approved_text: Before the dynasty can be established, scores must be settled.

ceo_equipped_set_bonuses.description: Before the dynasty can be established, scores must be settled.
ceo_equipped_set_bonuses.title: Bandits & Murderers

description.last_approved_text: By bravely leading from the front and his lightning conquest of the south, Sun Ce was by many compared to the great warrior-king Xiang Yu.

ceo_equipped_set_bonuses.description: By bravely leading from the front and his lightning conquest of the south, Sun Ce was by many compared to the great warrior-king Xiang Yu.
ceo_equipped_set_bonuses.title: The Little Conqueror

description.last_approved_text: Zhou Yu understood the importance of the Jing province. From its advantageous position, one may march on the great plains or the Riverland's with impunity.

ceo_equipped_set_bonuses.description: Zhou Yu understood the importance of the Jing province. From its advantageous position, one may march on the great plains or the Riverland's with impunity.
ceo_equipped_set_bonuses.title: Secure Zhou Yu's ambition

description.last_approved_text: For her own security, Lady Sun established a guard of fierce fighting women.

ceo_equipped_set_bonuses.description: For her own security, Lady Sun established a guard of fierce fighting women.
ceo_equipped_set_bonuses.title: Lady Sun's Guards

description.last_approved_text: After having expanded his domain to the corners of the land, Sun Ce began to treat learned and virtuous men with the utmost respect.

ceo_equipped_set_bonuses.description: After having expanded his domain to the corners of the land, Sun Ce began to treat learned and virtuous men with the utmost respect.
ceo_equipped_set_bonuses.title: Governors & Scholars

description.last_approved_text: By learning from the wise and worthy masters, one is driven to give their all, and then more.

ceo_equipped_set_bonuses.description: By learning from the wise and worthy masters, one is driven to give their all, and then more.
ceo_equipped_set_bonuses.title: Grandmasters

description.last_approved_text: Sun Ce's greatest fear was not fulfilling his father ambition of establishing a Sun Dynasty.

ceo_equipped_set_bonuses.description: Sun Ce's greatest fear was not fulfilling his father ambition of establishing a Sun Dynasty.
ceo_equipped_set_bonuses.title: Legacy of Sun Ce

description.last_approved_text: With just a piece of stone, Sun Ce was able to inherit his father's dauntless commanders.

ceo_equipped_set_bonuses.description: With just a piece of stone, Sun Ce was able to inherit his father's dauntless commanders.
ceo_equipped_set_bonuses.title: The Old Guard

description.last_approved_text: To secure the dynasty's future, one most find capable generals before their talent is noticed by others.

ceo_equipped_set_bonuses.description: To secure the dynasty's future, one most find capable generals before their talent is noticed by others.
ceo_equipped_set_bonuses.title: Next Generation

description.last_approved_text: No army can march on an empty stomach. By controlling Kuaji they could march forever.

ceo_equipped_set_bonuses.description: No army can march on an empty stomach. By controlling Kuaji they could march forever.
ceo_equipped_set_bonuses.title: Secure Campaign Provisions

description.last_approved_text: Sun Ce, having been called to action in a dream, promised to restore this mountain temple.

ceo_equipped_set_bonuses.description: Sun Ce, having been called to action in a dream, promised to restore this mountain temple.
ceo_equipped_set_bonuses.title: Secure the Mountains

description.last_approved_text: Returning to Sun Jian's first seat of power is like coming back to one's true home.

ceo_equipped_set_bonuses.description: Returning to Sun Jian's first seat of power is like coming back to one's true home.
ceo_equipped_set_bonuses.title: Secure the Homestead

description.last_approved_text: The Yangtze, more than any nation, holds the flow between north and south. The one who controls the Yangtze, then, controls China.

ceo_equipped_set_bonuses.description: The Yangtze, more than any nation, holds the flow between north and south. The one who controls the Yangtze, then, controls China.
ceo_equipped_set_bonuses.title: Secure the middle Yangtze

description.last_approved_text: Riches lay strewn about, unattended, at the mouth of the Yangtze, like so many coins in a busy market, waiting to be taken…

ceo_equipped_set_bonuses.description: Riches lay strewn about, unattended, at the mouth of the Yangtze, like so many coins in a busy market, waiting to be taken…
ceo_equipped_set_bonuses.title: Secure the Base Resources

description.last_approved_text: Its name and greatness will echo throughout history: The Kingdom Of Wu.

description.last_approved_text: Until our last breath.
